name: RKR - Rush Kill Repeat
description:
RKR is a fast-paced 2D shooter where the player must swiftly navigate procedurally generated levels.

RUSH to to hunt down and KILL your enemies in the ever-changing halls of your new personal hell. REPEAT until your will fades and blood runs dry, or until your rage subsides and you claim what is rightfully yours.

RKR - Rush, Kill, Repeat Features:

  • Fast-paced, punishing gameplay
  • Procedurally-generated levels
  • Multiple game modes designed to enhance replayability
